headline: CES 2026: The costs of memory chips amid tech's data center pivot
summary: The costs of memory chips — especially those used in consumer devices — are expected to see a sharp rise in 2026 as more mega-cap tech companies ramp up their CapEx spending into AI infrastructure and data center projects. Yahoo Finance tech editor Dan Howley discusses the pricing pressures and demand surrounding these memory chip manufacturers and DRAM (Dynamic Random Access Memory). Also catch Dan Howley lay out what to expect in Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang's keynote address at the 2026 Consumer Technology Association (CES) event on Monday, January 5. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

content.title: CES 2026: The costs of memory chips amid tech's data center pivot
content.description:
The costs of memory chips — especially those used in consumer devices — are expected to see a sharp rise in 2026 as more mega-cap tech companies ramp up their CapEx spending into AI infrastructure and data center projects.

Yahoo Finance tech editor Dan Howley discusses the pricing pressures and demand surrounding these memory chip manufacturers and DRAM (Dynamic Random Access Memory).

Also catch Dan Howley lay out what to expect in Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang's keynote address at the 2026 Consumer Technology Association (CES) event on Monday, January 5.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.
